name: Candy Swap: Match 3 Extreme
description:
Welcome to Candyland! Play the most relaxing and splendid candy swap match 3 puzzle game, along with colourful candies and lollipop with no time limit, free and powerful Candy Bomb Blast boosters to cheer you up.

This sweet candy puzzle has a unique feature of Overlapping Candies: One candy slot has more than one candy sometimes and becomes tricky to candy crush it.

Swap candies to make sweet lines of 3 or more to create candy blasts! There are many special candies when you get a combo. This candy swipe game is based on one of the most popular mobile games of all time.

Download now and enjoy Sweet Candy swipe game for free.

Showcase your talent in this match-three game of sweet candy swipe game by making a Smart Move or Clever Combination which will be rewarded! Use your skill to solve all the puzzles in an efficient manner to get 3 stars for a prize!
